## IPnpmLockfilePolicies.disallowInsecureSha1 property

Forbid sha1 hashes in `pnpm-lock.yaml`

**Signature:**

```typescript
disallowInsecureSha1?: {
        enabled: boolean;
        exemptPackageVersions: Record<string, string[]>;
    };
```
